name: Food Stand Tycoon
description:
Welcome to your very own food stand!  Built for the weekly game jam #163, Theme: Tycoon, Food Stand Tycoon allows you to run your own Food Stand.  Make recipes out of ingredients, set a price and watch the customers reaction to your Menu.  

Gain Money and Rating (Game score).  A higher Rating unlocks more Recipe space and Ingredients on your menu.

Built from the ground up in 4 days by C Kyle Hansen as a side project to take a break from Indie Dev on Big Trouble with help from Robert Percival.

For a little more info on C, visit me at my website or twitter.

www.dihedronstudios.com
